Within this sketch, we have one face that contains one loop made up of seven lines. For clarity, the lines are numbered from 1 to 7, with each line starting at one point and ending at another. Upon completion, this part should resemble a rectangular prism with dimensions: - Width: 0.75 units - Height: 0.75 units - Length: 0.2143 units Confidence: 95%</description>
